About Micromax

1. Trusted Brand

2. Micromax is one of India's largest and most popular brands for smartphones as well as other electronics devices. It is famous for providing good value-for-money devices in the budget and mid-range segments.

3. Micromax has service centres in almost all the cities in India. You can locate the nearest Micromax service Centre through SMS. Type ASC < space > City Pin code Send this SMS to 9212230707

bad mobile
23 Jun 2018 By Flipkart Customer On flipkart.com

flipkart cheat show 4 gb rom but when i open the phone show 90 mb rom only nothing feature according jio mobile

Totally waste
08 Apr 2018 By senthil kumar On flipkart.com

Very worst product. Battery backup is very bad. Software and UI is hard to use. WhatsApp works after update. Only 4g volte and WiFi hotspot are working fine. Build quality is also poor. We cannot install and use third-party apps from unknown sources.
